basic.floral_language:
Astrophytum myriostigma
Floriography: charming, lovely, cute
Has a delicate cylindrical shape with 3-9, usually 5, rigid, fleshy, and pronounced vertical ribs forming a star-like shape observed from the top, high ornamental value.
Likes sunny places, shade properly under summer strong sunlight, does not have an apparent dormant period, often blooms in spring and summer. Flowers are light yellow.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers, light yellow flowers

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Likes light, no apparent period of dormancy, shade properly under summer strong light
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry, reduce water in summer high temperature
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply once every 1-2 months in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely
